skills.label: Define strategy
items: Define business drivers, create multiple driver prioritizations, analyze consistency ratio

skills.label: Optimize portfolios
items: Capture project requests and ideas, rate projects against business drivers, determine primary cost constraints, determine resource constraints, set project dependencies, create a portfolio analysis, review and modify prioritizations in an analysis, force projects in and out of analysis, determine hired resources, compare and run simulations for project portfolio selection, add additional constraints

skills.label: Create a new enterprise project
items: Create a project and manage workflow, use workflow approvals, import projects through project professional, create and manage project schedules using project web app, save and check in projects, import projects from excel

skills.label: Create programs
items: Insert sub-projects, create cross-project task dependencies, calculate sub-project summary fields, associate programs to portfolios, associate projects to programs

skills.label: Define deliverables
items: Add deliverables, set dependencies on deliverables, synchronize deliverables with project, link related items

skills.label: Create tasks and a Work Breakdown Structure (WBS)
items: Create and modify summary tasks and subtasks, rearrange tasks, create milestones, create manually scheduled tasks, set tasks as active or inactive

skills.label: Schedule the project
items: Set date constraints, deadlines, dependencies, links, duration equations, effort-driven tasks, and formulas
Choose task types
Enter duration
Set or change the task mode (manual or auto)
Display warnings and suggestions
Use estimated durations and user-controlled summary tasks

skills.label: Manage resources and teams
items: Edit resources with project web app, edit resources with project pro for office 365, create team resources, create team assignments, add a team task to a task page or timesheet, map resource roles (portfolio analysis)

skills.label: Perform resource engagement
items: Submit, accept, modify, and reject a resource engagement request
Build a team for a resource plan
Build a resource plan for a project
Set resource utilization
Use committed versus proposed assignments

skills.label: Build a project team
items: Build a project team through project pro for office 365 or project web app, build a project team through project web app, replace generic resources, work with proposed assignments

skills.label: Resolve resource over allocations across projects
items: Level resources using leveling methods
Plan resource allocations using team planner, task usage, resource requests page, and resource utilization

skills.label: Build a financial plan
items: Plan program financial requirements using the resource rate table, cost per use, cost resources

skills.label: Baseline enterprise projects
items: Set a protected baseline, set a baseline from project web app and project pro for office 365, clear and copy a baseline

skills.label: Select tracking method
items: Use percent complete, hours per period, actual work remaining, freeform, done, and not done fields

skills.label: Manage task assignments
items: Publish assignments, select a status manager, select an assignment owner, set the published values for individual tasks

skills.label: Update tasks and timesheets
items: Submit and recall timesheets, insert and remove tasks, reassign tasks, submit updates from my tasks, submit updates from a mobile app

skills.label: Approve tasks and timesheets
items: Accept task updates from tasks or timesheets, view impact of updates on a project, reject updates, approve and reject timesheets, manage delegations

skills.label: Update the project plan
items: Reschedule uncompleted work, update cost resources, publish schedule changes, utilize task update history, update schedules with protected user updates, close tasks for updates

skills.label: Collaborate and communicate projects and programs
items: Create a project site
Add document library
Add lists, calendar, and folders
Modify site layout
Create program (master-sub) structure using subsites
Add risks and issues

label: Control, report, manage, and extend the PPM solution

skills.label: Customize Project Web App views and reports
items: Create a portfolio report using excel
Create dashboards
Copy and edit views
Set default views
Rename field names
Group, filter, and sort views

skills.label: Advanced Reporting
items: Load the content pack with power bi, create reports and dashboards, ask natural language questions, leverage filters, pin results to the dashboard, create views with tiles from multiple datasets and reports, create reports using the out-of-the-box reporting capability

skills.label: Manage configurable enterprise objects
items: Create and manage enterprise project templates, define enterprise custom fields, define project workflows, define enterprise global objects, extend with office store apps, add social elements

skills.label: Implement a security model
items: Change between sharepoint security mode and project security mode, create users, create and modify security groups and categories, set up project site permissions
